remarks: If two complex numbers are apart, their quotient is apart from one. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 20-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divclapd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
divap1d.4 $e |- ( ph -> A # B ) $.
divap1d $p |- ( ph -> ( A / B ) # 1 ) $.
